name: Skotchka3D
description:
Hyper casual platform game, where you jump from pole to pole without falling down. Practice your curved shot and physics estimate simmilar to billiard style games, and try to beat best scores from online leaderboards.

17/7/22 - 0.3 version, unlock chicken cube character after 5000 highscore, added pause menu and did some minor tweaks

15/7/22 - 0.2 version, available for free public testing on Android devices, still in development

Game by: Sonja Hranjec

Mentor: Dominik Cvetkovski
